column2: description of the command for the /help
spawn an item in front on you
basic stats - location, time, sunpos, light
[NOT USED] ue4, shinbi, twin, phase, fem[a-c], mal[a-c], dum[1-4]
equip armor, clothes or wield something
kill a player, NPC or animal (if possible)
fill | dump | tool | sort | WIPE # show bag gui
1|10000 # set score that player needs to level up
List of inventory items in bags
[filter] (optionally filtered) list of all items in game
list and status of all farm plots
list of all npcs around you
pickup items like mushrooms, herbs, ore, wood
list of animation poses for character
list of dropped items in world
all|avail|biome|water # list of all fish, or available fish in this area
List of placed items like plants
list of buildings and built items in world
list of chests and storage boxes in world
